import React,{createContext,useState,useContext}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);// Store registered users
